name: Curse of the candy
description:
You're a little child who has taken some candy from previous houses but you have seen a big mansion and wanted to approach it because your bucket isn't enough fill.

   As you approach it, you enter in an haunted and lost graveyard in front of this mansion. Ghosts and traps are concealed in it but the question is...

Will you survive long enough to escape this cemetery and don't be frightened by them ?

Use ZQSD or keyboard arrows to move !

Game Part of Trick or Treat Jam

Modifier : Be home by sunset

External content :

Fog script - Akıllı Mum

FREE Stylized PBR Textures Pack - Lumo-Art 3D

Halloween Cemetery Set - 3dfancy
